connector.description: Store and retrieve blobs from Azure Storage Blob Service using SDK v12.

camel.sink.path.accountName.name: camel.sink.path.accountName
camel.sink.path.accountName.description: Azure account name to be used for authentication with azure blob services

camel.sink.endpoint.autoDiscoverClient.name: camel.sink.endpoint.autoDiscoverClient
camel.sink.endpoint.autoDiscoverClient.description: Setting the autoDiscoverClient mechanism, if true, the component will look for a client instance in the registry automatically otherwise it will skip that checking.

camel.sink.endpoint.blobName.name: camel.sink.endpoint.blobName
camel.sink.endpoint.blobName.description: The blob name, to consume specific blob from a container. However on producer, is only required for the operations on the blob level

camel.sink.endpoint.blobOffset.name: camel.sink.endpoint.blobOffset
camel.sink.endpoint.blobOffset.description: Set the blob offset for the upload or download operations, default is 0

camel.sink.endpoint.blobServiceClient.name: camel.sink.endpoint.blobServiceClient
camel.sink.endpoint.blobServiceClient.description: Client to a storage account. This client does not hold any state about a particular storage account but is instead a convenient way of sending off appropriate requests to the resource on the service. It may also be used to construct URLs to blobs and containers. This client contains operations on a service account. Operations on a container are available on BlobContainerClient through getBlobContainerClient(String), and operations on a blob are available on BlobClient through getBlobContainerClient(String).getBlobClient(String).

camel.sink.endpoint.blobType.name: camel.sink.endpoint.blobType
camel.sink.endpoint.blobType.description: The blob type in order to initiate the appropriate settings for each blob type One of: [blockblob] [appendblob] [pageblob]

camel.sink.endpoint.closeStreamAfterRead.name: camel.sink.endpoint.closeStreamAfterRead
camel.sink.endpoint.closeStreamAfterRead.description: Close the stream after read or keep it open, default is true

camel.sink.endpoint.credentials.name: camel.sink.endpoint.credentials
camel.sink.endpoint.credentials.description: StorageSharedKeyCredential can be injected to create the azure client, this holds the important authentication information

camel.sink.endpoint.dataCount.name: camel.sink.endpoint.dataCount
camel.sink.endpoint.dataCount.description: How many bytes to include in the range. Must be greater than or equal to 0 if specified.

camel.sink.endpoint.fileDir.name: camel.sink.endpoint.fileDir
camel.sink.endpoint.fileDir.description: The file directory where the downloaded blobs will be saved to, this can be used in both, producer and consumer

camel.sink.endpoint.maxResultsPerPage.name: camel.sink.endpoint.maxResultsPerPage
camel.sink.endpoint.maxResultsPerPage.description: Specifies the maximum number of blobs to return, including all BlobPrefix elements. If the request does not specify maxResultsPerPage or specifies a value greater than 5,000, the server will return up to 5,000 items.

camel.sink.endpoint.maxRetryRequests.name: camel.sink.endpoint.maxRetryRequests
camel.sink.endpoint.maxRetryRequests.description: Specifies the maximum number of additional HTTP Get requests that will be made while reading the data from a response body.

camel.sink.endpoint.prefix.name: camel.sink.endpoint.prefix
camel.sink.endpoint.prefix.description: Filters the results to return only blobs whose names begin with the specified prefix. May be null to return all blobs.

camel.sink.endpoint.regex.name: camel.sink.endpoint.regex
camel.sink.endpoint.regex.description: Filters the results to return only blobs whose names match the specified regular expression. May be null to return all if both prefix and regex are set, regex takes the priority and prefix is ignored.

camel.sink.endpoint.serviceClient.name: camel.sink.endpoint.serviceClient
camel.sink.endpoint.serviceClient.description: Client to a storage account. This client does not hold any state about a particular storage account but is instead a convenient way of sending off appropriate requests to the resource on the service. It may also be used to construct URLs to blobs and containers. This client contains operations on a service account. Operations on a container are available on BlobContainerClient through BlobServiceClient#getBlobContainerClient(String), and operations on a blob are available on BlobClient through BlobContainerClient#getBlobClient(String).

camel.sink.endpoint.timeout.name: camel.sink.endpoint.timeout
camel.sink.endpoint.timeout.description: An optional timeout value beyond which a RuntimeException will be raised.

camel.sink.endpoint.blobSequenceNumber.name: camel.sink.endpoint.blobSequenceNumber
camel.sink.endpoint.blobSequenceNumber.description: A user-controlled value that you can use to track requests. The value of the sequence number must be between 0 and 263 - 1.The default value is 0.

camel.sink.endpoint.blockListType.name: camel.sink.endpoint.blockListType
camel.sink.endpoint.blockListType.description: Specifies which type of blocks to return. One of: [committed] [uncommitted] [all]

camel.sink.endpoint.closeStreamAfterWrit.name: camel.sink.endpoint.closeStreamAfterWrite
camel.sink.endpoint.closeStreamAfterWrit.description: Close the stream after write or keep it open, default is true

camel.sink.endpoint.commitBlockListLater.name: camel.sink.endpoint.commitBlockListLater
camel.sink.endpoint.commitBlockListLater.description: When is set to true, the staged blocks will not be committed directly.

camel.sink.endpoint.createAppendBlob.name: camel.sink.endpoint.createAppendBlob
camel.sink.endpoint.createAppendBlob.description: When is set to true, the append blocks will be created when committing append blocks.

camel.sink.endpoint.createPageBlob.name: camel.sink.endpoint.createPageBlob
camel.sink.endpoint.createPageBlob.description: When is set to true, the page blob will be created when uploading page blob.

camel.sink.endpoint.downloadLinkExpirati.name: camel.sink.endpoint.downloadLinkExpiration
camel.sink.endpoint.downloadLinkExpirati.description: Override the default expiration (millis) of URL download link.

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.operation.name: camel.sink.endpoint.operation
camel.sink.endpoint.operation.description: The blob operation that can be used with this component on the producer One of: [listBlobContainers] [createBlobContainer] [deleteBlobContainer] [listBlobs] [getBlob] [deleteBlob] [downloadBlobToFile] [downloadLink] [uploadBlockBlob] [stageBlockBlobList] [commitBlobBlockList] [getBlobBlockList] [createAppendBlob] [commitAppendBlob] [createPageBlob] [uploadPageBlob] [resizePageBlob] [clearPageBlob] [getPageBlobRanges]

camel.sink.endpoint.pageBlobSize.name: camel.sink.endpoint.pageBlobSize
camel.sink.endpoint.pageBlobSize.description: Specifies the maximum size for the page blob, up to 8 TB. The page blob size must be aligned to a 512-byte boundary.

camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous
camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.sink.endpoint.accessKey.name: camel.sink.endpoint.accessKey
camel.sink.endpoint.accessKey.description: Access key for the associated azure account name to be used for authentication with azure blob services

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.autoD.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.autoDiscoverClient
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.autoD.description: Setting the autoDiscoverClient mechanism, if true, the component will look for a client instance in the registry automatically otherwise it will skip that checking.

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.blobN.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.blobName
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.blobN.description: The blob name, to consume specific blob from a container. However on producer, is only required for the operations on the blob level

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.blobO.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.blobOffset
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.blobO.description: Set the blob offset for the upload or download operations, default is 0

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.blobT.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.blobType
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.blobT.description: The blob type in order to initiate the appropriate settings for each blob type One of: [blockblob] [appendblob] [pageblob]

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.close.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.closeStreamAfterRead
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.close.description: Close the stream after read or keep it open, default is true

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.crede.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.credentials
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.crede.description: StorageSharedKeyCredential can be injected to create the azure client, this holds the important authentication information

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.dataC.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.dataCount
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.dataC.description: How many bytes to include in the range. Must be greater than or equal to 0 if specified.

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.fileD.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.fileDir
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.fileD.description: The file directory where the downloaded blobs will be saved to, this can be used in both, producer and consumer

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.maxRe.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.maxResultsPerPage
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.maxRe.description: Specifies the maximum number of blobs to return, including all BlobPrefix elements. If the request does not specify maxResultsPerPage or specifies a value greater than 5,000, the server will return up to 5,000 items.

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.maxRe.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.maxRetryRequests
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.maxRe.description: Specifies the maximum number of additional HTTP Get requests that will be made while reading the data from a response body.

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.prefi.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.prefix
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.prefi.description: Filters the results to return only blobs whose names begin with the specified prefix. May be null to return all blobs.

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.regex.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.regex

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.servi.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.serviceClient
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.servi.description: Client to a storage account. This client does not hold any state about a particular storage account but is instead a convenient way of sending off appropriate requests to the resource on the service. It may also be used to construct URLs to blobs and containers. This client contains operations on a service account. Operations on a container are available on BlobContainerClient through BlobServiceClient#getBlobContainerClient(String), and operations on a blob are available on BlobClient through BlobContainerClient#getBlobClient(String).

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.timeo.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.timeout
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.timeo.description: An optional timeout value beyond which a RuntimeException will be raised.

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.blobS.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.blobSequenceNumber
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.blobS.description: A user-controlled value that you can use to track requests. The value of the sequence number must be between 0 and 263 - 1.The default value is 0.

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.block.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.blockListType
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.block.description: Specifies which type of blocks to return. One of: [committed] [uncommitted] [all]

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.close.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.closeStreamAfterWrite
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.close.description: Close the stream after write or keep it open, default is true

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.commi.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.commitBlockListLater
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.commi.description: When is set to true, the staged blocks will not be committed directly.

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.creat.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.createAppendBlob
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.creat.description: When is set to true, the append blocks will be created when committing append blocks.

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.creat.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.createPageBlob
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.creat.description: When is set to true, the page blob will be created when uploading page blob.

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.downl.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.downloadLinkExpiration
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.downl.description: Override the default expiration (millis) of URL download link.

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.lazyS.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.lazyS.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.opera.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.operation
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.opera.description: The blob operation that can be used with this component on the producer One of: [listBlobContainers] [createBlobContainer] [deleteBlobContainer] [listBlobs] [getBlob] [deleteBlob] [downloadBlobToFile] [downloadLink] [uploadBlockBlob] [stageBlockBlobList] [commitBlobBlockList] [getBlobBlockList] [createAppendBlob] [commitAppendBlob] [createPageBlob] [uploadPageBlob] [resizePageBlob] [clearPageBlob] [getPageBlobRanges]

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.pageB.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.pageBlobSize
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.pageB.description: Specifies the maximum size for the page blob, up to 8 TB. The page blob size must be aligned to a 512-byte boundary.

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.autow.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.autowiredEnabled
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.autow.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

camel.component.azure-storage-blob.acces.name: camel.component.azure-storage-blob.accessKey
camel.component.azure-storage-blob.acces.description: Access key for the associated azure account name to be used for authentication with azure blob services
